:py:mod:`A1_Fe_scf_simple <ase2sprkkr.examples.A1_Fe_scf_simple.Fe.main>` 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Simple SCF calculation for bcc Fe.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A1_Fe_scf_simple/Fe.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A2_Fe_scf_input_modifications <ase2sprkkr.examples.A2_Fe_scf_input_modifications.Fe.main>` 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Demonstration how to chage input SPRKKR file.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A2_Fe_scf_input_modifications/Fe.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A3_Fe_dos <ase2sprkkr.examples.A3_Fe_dos.Fe.main>` 
------------------------------------------------------------

SCF calculation for Fe using kkrscf and consequent DOS by kkrgen.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A3_Fe_dos/Fe.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A4_CPA_Example <ase2sprkkr.examples.A4_CPA_Example.Ni_doped_STO.main>` 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ni Doped SrTiO3 as calculated by the CPA method. This example demonstrate partial occupations.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A4_CPA_Example/Ni_doped_STO.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A5_Al_EOS <ase2sprkkr.examples.A5_Al_EOS.Al.main>` 
------------------------------------------------------------

Total energy SCF calculations as a function of Volume and corresponding
equation of state fiting.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A5_Al_EOS/Al.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A6_Cu_MSSPEC <ase2sprkkr.examples.A6_Cu_MSSPEC.Cu.main>` 
------------------------------------------------------------------

Simple SCF calculations for fcc Cu in combination with msspec code to generate
photoelectron diffraction.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A6_Cu_MSSPEC/Cu.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A7_SrTiO3_MSSPEC <ase2sprkkr.examples.A7_SrTiO3_MSSPEC.STO.main>` 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

SCF calculations for  SrTiO3 in combination with msspec code to generate
photoelectron diffraction.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A7_SrTiO3_MSSPEC/STO.html#main>`_


:py:mod:`A8_ARPES_and_plotting <ase2sprkkr.examples.A8_ARPES_and_plotting.arpes.main>` 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Example of an ARPES calculation and plotting its results.  `[show source] <./_modules/ase2sprkkr/examples/A8_ARPES_and_plotting/arpes.html#main>`_
